mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Refrigerator (item_name, insert_dt, amt, type, user_id) VALUES ( #{itemName}, now() , #{amt}, #{type}, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT amt, type, item_name FROM Refrigerator WHERE item_name = #{itemName} and user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY insert_dt DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM Refrigerator WHERE purchased_yn = 'N' and user_id = #{userID} ORDER BY insert_dt desc
mapper.update: UPDATE Refrigerator SET item_name = #{itemName}, amt = #{amt}, type = #{type}, purchased_yn = 'Y', purchased_dt = now() WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT idx, item_name, substring(purchased_dt, 1, 10) as purchased_dt, timestampdiff(day, purchased_dt, now()) as after_day, type FROM Refrigerator WHERE finish_yn = 'N' and purchased_yn = 'Y' and type like concat('%',#{type},'%') and user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY after_day desc

SELECT idx, item_name, amt, substr(purchased_dt, 1, 10) as purchased_dt, type FROM Refrigerator WHERE purchased_yn = 'Y' and item_name like concat('%',#{itemName},'%') and user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY purchased_dt desc
